get.description: Use this endpoint to check your Account Status and get your Upgrade Token

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Your Fyatu Email Address

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: Your Fyatu Client ID

Result.value:
{
    "status": "failed",
    "statusCode": 400,
    "errors": true,
    "message": "HTTPS is required to proceed this request.",
    "data": []
}

message.example: HTTPS is required to proceed this request.

amount.description: Amount to be Deposited in the Card after Creation (Initial Deposit).

cardName.description: The Name that will be Shown on the Card

customerId.description: The ID of the CardHolder whom the Card Belongs to (Provided by Fyatu)

productCode.description: The Card Product's code for the Card you want to Create

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date based on the card creation date. In format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End date based on the card creation date. In format YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to be fetched

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to be fetched

post.description: Use this endpoint to upgrade your Fyatu account from Personal to Business

upgradeToken.description: The Upgrade Token you got from the "Get Status" endpoint.

businessName.description: Legal Name of your Business (Eg: Meta Platforms, Inc.)

appName.description: Name of your Application - The App that will integrate Fyatu (Eg: Facebook)

phoneNumber.description: Phone Number of the Contact Person (Eg. +1234567890)

directorName.description: Legal Full Name of the Director (Eg: John Miller Smith)

businessType.description: The Industry in which your application is doing business in.

country.description: ISO-2 Code of your country (Eg: TZ, CD, FR, UK)

businessAddress.description: The Full Address of your HQ (Eg. 123 Lamy Street, My City, My State)

Result.value:
{
  "status": "failed",
  "statusCode": 400,
  "errors": true,
  "message": "You already have a business account!",
  "data": []
}

message.example: You already have a business account!

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: This is the unique id of the particular card you want to unblock. You can get this id from the call to create a virtual card or list virtual cards

Result.value:

    "status": "failed",
    "statusCode": 404,
    "errors": true,
    "message": "No card found with the ID: c370b43b-d924-4a13-a638-bcbf3bc845830",
    "data": []
}

message.example: No card found with the ID: c370b43b-d924-4a13-a638-bcbf3bc845830

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: The ID of the Card as Provided by Fyatu

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: This is the unique id of the particular card you want to recharge. You can get this id from the call to create a virtual card or call to get virtual card details.

amount.description: This is the amount to withdraw from your card to your main balance.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: This is the unique id of the particular card you want to recharge. You can get this id from the call to create a virtual card or call to get virtual card details.

amount.description: This is the amount to load into the card.
